chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.sales.stage.amount.bar
chart.title: Opportunities By Sale Stage
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, selection_item.title as _sales_stage FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.opportunity.sales.stage.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.sales_stage_select GROUP BY selection_item.id ORDER BY selection_item.id

chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.by.stage.type.bar
chart.title: Pipeline by Stage and Type
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, selection_item.title as _sales_stage FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.opportunity.sales.stage.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.sales_stage_select and self.sales_stage_select not in (9, 10) GROUP BY selection_item.id ORDER BY selection_item.id

chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.source.amount.bar
chart.title: Opportunities By Source
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, Source.name as _source FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN base_source as Source ON self.source = Source.id GROUP BY _source ORDER BY _source

chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.type.amount.bar
chart.title: Opportunities By Type
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, opportunity_type.name as _opportunity_type FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN crm_opportunity_type as opportunity_type ON self.opportunity_type = opportunity_type.id GROUP BY opportunity_type.name ORDER BY opportunity_type.name

chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.won.by.leadsource.bar
chart.title: Opportunities Won By Lead Source
chart.dataset: SELECT count(*) AS lead_won, Source.name as _source FROM crm_opportunity self JOIN base_source as Source ON self.source = Source.id and self.sales_stage_select = 9 GROUP BY _source ORDER BY _source

chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.won.by.salesman.bar
chart.title: Opportunities Won By Salesman
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, sales_man.full_name as _sales_man FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN base_user_info as sales_man ON self.user_info = sales_man.id GROUP BY _sales_man ORDER BY _sales_man

chart.name: chart.opportunities.by.origin.by.stage
chart.title: Opportunities By Origin By Stage
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, src.name AS source, selection_item.title AS stage FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN base_source src on src.id = self.source LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.opportunity.sales.stage.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE selection_item.value = cast(self.sales_stage_select as char) GROUP BY selection_item.id, src.name ORDER BY selection_item.id, src.name

chart.name: chart.opportunities.pipeline.next.90d
chart.title: Pipeline next 90 days
chart.dataset:
SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, selection_item.title AS stage, 'Pipeline' as pipeline FROM crm_opportunity self JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.opportunity.sales.stage.select' JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE selection_item.value = cast(self.sales_stage_select as char) AND self.expected_close_date < current_date+ interval '90 day' AND self.sales_stage_select <9
GROUP BY selection_item.id, pipeline ORDER BY selection_item.id

chart.name: chart.leads.by.source.bar
chart.title: Leads by Source
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(*) AS leads, self.source.name AS source FROM Lead self WHERE self.createdOn BETWEEN :fromDateT AND :toDateT GROUP BY self.source.name ORDER BY self.source.name

chart.name: chart.leads.by.team.by.status.bar
chart.title: Leads by Team by Status
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.opportunity_amount) AS _opportunity_amount, team.name AS _team, selection_item.title as _status FROM crm_lead as self LEFT JOIN base_team as team ON self.team = team.id LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.lead.status.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE selection_item.value = cast(self.status_select as char) AND self.created_on BETWEEN DATE(:fromDateT) AND DATE(:toDateT) GROUP BY _status, _team ORDER BY _status, _team

chart.name: chart.leads.by.salesman.by.status.bar
chart.title: Leads by Salesman by Status
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.opportunity_amount) AS _opportunity_amount, sales_man.full_name as _sales_man, selection_item.title as _status FROM crm_lead as self LEFT JOIN base_user_info as sales_man ON self.user_info = sales_man.id LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.lead.status.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE selection_item.value = cast(self.status_select as char) and sales_man.full_name != '' AND self.created_on BETWEEN DATE(:fromDateT) AND DATE(:toDateT) GROUP BY _status, _sales_man ORDER BY _status, _sales_man

chart.name: chart.calls.types.by.user.bar
chart.title: Calls type by user
chart.dataset:
SELECT COUNT(_event.id) AS _total_calls, _user.full_name AS _user_name, _meta._select_title AS _call_status FROM crm_event AS _event LEFT JOIN base_user_info AS _user ON _event.user_info = _user.id
JOIN (SELECT cast(_item.value as int) AS _select_value, _item.title AS _select_title FROM meta_select AS _selection JOIN meta_select_item AS _item ON _selection.name = 'crm.event.call.status.select' AND _item.select_id = _selection.id ) AS _meta ON _meta._select_value = _event.call_status_select WHERE _event.type_select = 1 AND _event.created_on BETWEEN DATE(:fromDateT) AND DATE(:toDateT) GROUP BY _user_name, _call_status ORDER BY _user_name, _total_calls DESC

chart.name: chart.calls.types.by.team.bar
chart.title: Calls type by team
chart.dataset:
SELECT COUNT(_event.id) AS _total_calls, _team.name AS _team_name, _meta._select_title AS _call_status FROM crm_event AS _event LEFT JOIN base_team AS _team ON _event.team = _team.id
JOIN (SELECT cast(_item.value as int) AS _select_value, _item.title AS _select_title FROM meta_select AS _selection JOIN meta_select_item AS _item ON _selection.name = 'crm.event.call.status.select' AND _item.select_id = _selection.id ) AS _meta ON _meta._select_value = _event.call_status_select WHERE _event.type_select = 1 AND _event.created_on BETWEEN DATE(:fromDateT) AND DATE(:toDateT) GROUP BY _team_name, _call_status ORDER BY _team_name, _total_calls DESC

chart.name: chart.calls.types.by.team.by.user.bar
chart.title: Calls by team by user
chart.dataset:
SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _total_calls, salesMan.fullName AS _sales_man FROM Event self, UserInfo salesMan
WHERE self.typeSelect = 1 AND self.userInfo = salesMan AND self.team = :team AND self.createdOn BETWEEN DATE(:fromDateT) AND DATE(:todayDate) GROUP BY salesMan.fullName ORDER BY salesMan.fullName

chart.name: chart.open.tickets.by.priority.bar
chart.title: Open tickets by priority
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _total_calls, selection_item.title AS _priority FROM crm_event as self RIGHT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON (cast(selection_item.value as int) = self.priority_select and self.ticket_status_select != 5) WHERE selection_item.select_id =(select id from meta_select where name='crm.event.ticket.priority.select') AND self.type_select = 5 GROUP BY _priority ORDER BY _priority

chart.name: chart.open.ticket.priority.distribution.bar
chart.title: Ticket distribution by Priority
chart.dataset: select (count(self.id)*100/(select CASE WHEN count(*)=0 THEN 1 ELSE count(*) END from crm_event where ticket_status_select!=5 and priority_select is not null)) as _total_calls, selection_item.title as _priority from crm_event self RIGHT JOIN meta_select_item selection_item ON (cast(selection_item.value as int)=self.priority_select and self.ticket_status_select!=5) where selection_item.select_id=(select id from meta_select where name='crm.event.ticket.priority.select') AND self.type_select = 5 group by _priority

chart.name: chart.open.tickets.by.status.bar
chart.title: Open tickets by status
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _total_calls, selection_item.title AS _status FROM crm_event as self RIGHT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON (cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.ticket_status_select and self.ticket_status_select != 5) WHERE selection_item.select_id = (select id from meta_select where name = 'crm.event.ticket.status.select') AND cast(selection_item.value as int)!=5 AND self.type_select = 5 GROUP BY _status ORDER BY _status

chart.name: chart.user.by.open.cases.bar
chart.title: Open Cases by Agents
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _cases, sales_man.full_name AS _sales_man, selection_item.title AS _status FROM crm_event as self JOIN base_user_info as sales_man ON self.user_info = sales_man.id JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.event.ticket.status.select' JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE self.type_select = 5 AND self.ticket_status_select != 5 AND cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.ticket_status_select GROUP BY _status, _sales_man ORDER BY _status, _sales_man

chart.name: chart.customer.by.open.cases.bar
chart.title: New Cases by Customer
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _cases, self.clientPartner.fullName AS _partner, selection_item.title AS _status FROM Event self, MetaSelectItem selection_item WHERE self.typeSelect = 5 AND self.ticketStatusSelect != 5 AND self.createdOn >= :fromDateT AND self.createdOn <= :toDateT AND selection_item.select.name = 'crm.event.ticket.status.select' AND cast(selection_item.value as int) = self.ticketStatusSelect GROUP BY selection_item.title, self.clientPartner.fullName ORDER BY selection_item.title, self.clientPartner.fullName

chart.name: chart.leads.by.country.bar
chart.title: Leads by Country
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _total_leads, country.name AS _country FROM crm_lead as self LEFT JOIN base_country as country ON self.primary_country = country.id WHERE self.created_on BETWEEN DATE(:fromDateT) AND DATE(:toDateT) GROUP BY _country ORDER BY _country

chart.name: chart.created.leads.per.month
chart.title: Created leads per month
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _leads, DATE_PART('month', self.created_on) AS _month FROM crm_lead self WHERE self.created_on BETWEEN DATE(:todayDate) - CAST(:monthSelect as int) * INTERVAL '1 month' AND DATE(:todayDate) GROUP BY _month

chart.name: chart.due.open.ticket.gauge.bar
chart.title: Due Open Tickets
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _total_ticket, (select Count(id) from crm_event as open_ticket where open_ticket.ticket_status_select != 5) as _open_ticket FROM crm_event as self

chart.name: chart.created.tickets.by.month.by.priority.bar
chart.title: Total created tickets by month by priority
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(_ticket.id) AS _tickets, _meta_status.status_title AS _priority, DATE_PART('month', _ticket.created_on) AS _month FROM crm_event AS _ticket JOIN (SELECT cast(_item.value as int) AS status_value, _item.title AS status_title FROM meta_select AS _selection LEFT JOIN meta_select_item AS _item ON _selection.name = 'crm.event.ticket.priority.select' WHERE _selection.id = _item.select_id ) AS _meta_status ON _ticket.priority_select = _meta_status.status_value WHERE _ticket.type_select=5 AND _ticket.created_on BETWEEN now() - INTERVAL '6 month' AND now() GROUP BY _priority, _month ORDER BY _priority

chart.name: chart.created.tickets.by.month.by.status
chart.title: Total created tickets by month by status
chart.dataset:
SELECT COUNT(_ticket.id) AS _tickets, _meta_status.status_title AS _status, DATE_PART('month', _ticket.created_on) AS _month FROM crm_event AS _ticket JOIN
(SELECT cast(_item.value as int) AS status_value, _item.title AS status_title FROM meta_select AS _selection LEFT JOIN meta_select_item AS _item ON _selection.name = 'crm.event.ticket.status.select' WHERE _selection.id = _item.select_id ) AS _meta_status
ON _ticket.ticket_status_select = _meta_status.status_value WHERE _ticket.created_on BETWEEN now() - INTERVAL '6 month' AND now() AND _ticket.type_select=5 GROUP BY _status, _month

chart.name: chart.open.tickets.by.month.by.agent
chart.title: Total open tickets by month by user
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(_ticket.id) AS _tickets, _user.full_name AS _agent, DATE_PART('month', _ticket.created_on) AS _month FROM crm_event AS _ticket LEFT JOIN base_user_info AS _user ON _ticket.user_info = _user.id WHERE _ticket.created_on BETWEEN now() - INTERVAL '6 month' AND now() AND _ticket.type_select != 5 GROUP BY _agent, _month

chart.name: chart.customer.crm.activities
chart.title: CRM Activities
chart.dataset: SELECT coalesce(COUNT(_event.id),0) AS _num_event, selection_item.title AS _type FROM meta_select as selection JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id LEFT JOIN crm_event as _event ON _event.type_select=cast(selection_item.value as int) AND _event.contact_partner=:id WHERE selection.name = 'crm.event.type.select' GROUP BY _type
